metadata.titleEn: Deep fine structure data set of crust and upper mantle in typical areas of southern China (2019-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 中国南部典型地区地壳上地幔深部速度结构数据集（2019-2020）
metadata.description:
（1）An Ms 6.0 earthquake struck Changning county, Sichuan basin, SW China on 17 June 2019, which caused huge casualties and economic losses. Four Ms greater than 5.0 events subsequently occurred around the Changning source area, three of which occurred within one week. In order to better understand the mechanism of these moderate-sized earthquakes, we determine 3-D high-resolution velocity models around the source area simultaneously relocating earthquakes using double-difference tomography. In the present study, we use a total of 53,487 P-wave and 52,527 S-wave arrival times from 8818 events recorded at 39 seismic stations. Our results show that focal depths of the Changning mainshock and most aftershocks are ~5–10 km, and they form a fault plane with a steep dip angle. Most earthquakes are underlain by the zone with low Vp, low Vs, and high Vp/Vs anomalies, reflecting the existence of fluids there. These results suggest that the Changning mainshock and other moderate-sized earthquakes might be associated with the influence of fluids that could decrease effective normal stress on the fault planes. These fluids might be related to the hot and wet mantle upwelling in the big mantle wedge due to the deep subduction of the Indian plate down to the mantle transition zone. A clear high-to-low velocity transition zone is observed at ~10 km depth beneath the Gongxian and Xingwen swarms, which matches well with the detachment layer revealed by deep seismic soundings in the area. All these results suggest that the structural contrast could control the mainshock generation and aftershock extension.
（2）The Tanlu fault zone is the most significant active fault in eastern China, which generated the great 1668 Tancheng earthquake (M 8.5). It is still unclear whether or not there is a link between the great earthquake generation and the upper-mantle structure. To address this issue, we study P-wave upper-mantle tomography beneath eastern China using 44,047 teleseismic P-wave arrival times. Our results show that at depths<150 km, high-velocity (high-V) anomalies appear west of the Tanlu fault zone, whereas low-velocity (low-V) anomalies are visible east of the fault zone. Strong lateral heterogeneities are revealed along the fault zone. At depths of 230–470 km, northwest of the Tanlu fault zone, there are obvious low-V anomalies that may reflect hot and wet mantle upwelling, whereas to the east high-V anomalies are visible, which may reflect the detached Eurasian lithosphere (downwelling). In the mantle transition zone (MTZ), both high-V and low-V anomalies are revealed, and the widespread high-V anomalies may reflect the stagnant Pacific slab. Beneath the hypocenter of the 1668 Tancheng earthquake, intermittent low-V anomalies are revealed in the upper mantle down to the MTZ depth, which may reflect hot and wet mantle upwelling flow. Integrating the present results with previous findings, we deem that the Tancheng earthquake was affected by fluids from the hot and wet mantle upwelling associated with the lithospheric delamination. Complicated mantle convection, including both upwelling and downwelling flows, may occur under the Tanlu fault zone in the big mantle wedge above the stagnant Pacific slab in the MTZ.
（3）Since the occurrence of the 2008 Wenchuan earthquake (Ms8.0), many researchers have conducted extensive seismological and geophysical observations and investigations and obtained important results about the Longmenshan fault zone.
Crustal structure inferred from local tomography shows that seismic velocity exhibits significant changes across the Wenchuan earthquake hypocenter from the south to the north. To the south, obvious low-velocity (low-V) anomalies exist, whereas strong lateral heterogeneities are revealed to the north, which may explain why the aftershocks extend northeastward. The Wenchuan earthquake occurred at the boundary between high-velocity (high-V) and low-V anomalies and a significant low-V zone is revealed below the mainshock hypocenter, suggesting that the nucleation of the Wenchuan earthquake was related to partial melts and/or fluid effects and associated with the reduction of effective normal stress on the fault plane, due to high temperature and high pressure in the Longmenshan fault zone caused by the India-Asia collision. The upper-mantle structure inferred from teleseismic tomography shows that the Longmenshan fault zone is located in the transition zone from low-V anomalies beneath the Songpan-Ganzi block to high-V anomalies beneath the Sichuan basin. This structural feature extends down to 200−300 km depths. High-V anomalies in the mantle transition zone are connected with those in the upper mantle beneath the Burma arc, indicating that the Wenchuan earthquake could be associated with upwelling of hot and wet materials in the big mantle wedge formed by the deep subduction of the Indian plate. These results suggest that the generation of the Wenchuan earthquake was related to structural heterogeneities in not only the crust but also the upper mantle.  In addition, the Wenchuan earthquake may be related to the lower crustal flow, crustal shortening and Zipingpu Reservoir triggering.
metadata.descriptionCn:
（1）2019年6月17日，中国西南部四川盆地长宁县发生6.0级地震，造成巨大人员伤亡和经济损失。随后，长宁震源区周边发生了4起大于5.0 Ms的地震事件，其中3起发生在一周内。为了更好地理解这些中等规模地震的发生机制，我们利用双差层析成像技术，在震源区周围进行了地震重定位，同时建立了三维高分辨率速度模型。在本研究中，我们使用了39个地震台站记录的8818个地震事件的53487个P波和52527个S波到时间。结果表明，长宁主震和大部分余震震源深度约5～10km，形成一个陡倾角的断层面。大多数地震都在低Vp、低Vs和高Vp/Vs异常带的下方，反映了那里存在流体。这些结果表明，长宁主震和其他中等规模地震可能与流体降低了断层面有效正应力的影响有关。这些流体可能与印度板块向地幔过渡带的深俯冲导致大地幔楔中的热湿地幔上涌有关。在巩县群和兴文群下方约10km深处，观察到一条明显的高低速过渡带，与该区深部地震探测揭示的滑脱层吻合较好。这些结果表明，构造对比可以控制主震的产生和余震的扩展。
（2）郯庐断裂带是我国东部最重要的活动断裂带，发生过1668年郯城8.5级地震。目前尚不清楚大地震的发生与上地幔结构之间是否存在联系。为了解决这个问题，我们利用44047个远震P波到达时间研究了中国东部地区的P波上地幔层析成像。结果表明，在深度小于150km时，郯庐断裂带以西出现高波速异常，而断裂带以东出现低波速异常。沿断裂带显示出强烈的横向不均质性。在郯庐断裂带西北部230～470km深处，存在明显的低波速异常，可能反映了热湿地幔的上涌，而在东部，高波速异常是十分清晰的，可能反映了拆沉的欧亚岩石圈（下降流）。地幔转换带既有高波速异常，也有低波速异常，大范围的高波速异常可能反映了滞留的太平洋板块。在1668年郯城地震的震源下，上地幔至地幔转换带深度出现了间歇性的低波速异常，反映了热湿地幔上涌流。综合目前的研究结果和以往的研究结果，我们认为郯城地震是受岩石圈拆沉引起的热湿地幔上涌流体的影响。在郯庐断裂带下方，地幔转换带中滞留的太平洋板块上方的大地幔楔可能发生复杂的地幔对流，包括上升流和下降流。
（3）汶川地震后, 为认识发震机理, 在龙门山断裂带及周边地区开展了丰富的地震学和地球物理学等方面的 野外观测与研究工作, 获得了有意义研究成果. 近震成像获得的地壳结构显示, 以汶川主震震中为界, 龙门山断 裂带南北两侧波速存在明显差别, 以南地区为明显低波速异常, 而以北地区为显著横向不均匀性, 这也许可以解 释汶川地震的余震为何向东北方向延伸. 汶川主震发生在高低波速异常的边界, 且其下方存在低波速高泊松比异 常. 这一结果表明, 印度-欧亚板块的碰撞挤压在龙门山断裂带附近形成的高温高压导致了部分熔融或流体作用, 降低了断层面处的有效正应力, 因而诱发了汶川地震. 远震成像获得的上地幔结构显示, 龙门山断裂带处于松潘甘孜地块下方的低波速异常向四川盆地下方的高波速异常的过渡区, 且这种结构延伸至200~300 km深度, 而在地 幔转换带中的高波速异常与缅甸弧下方的上地幔高波速异常相连接, 说明汶川地震的发生与印度板块深俯冲而形 成的“大地幔楔”结构中的低波速异常所代表的热湿上涌等动力学过程密切相关. 因此, 本文认为汶川地震不 仅与地壳结构密切相关, 而且还受上地幔异常结构的影响. 另外, 汶川地震还可能与下地壳流、地壳缩短和紫坪铺 水库触发等动力学过程有关.
metadata.instructions:
File name: Seismic relocation and velocity model are stored in plain text format, and the file name is "yyyy"_ xxxx_ Zzzz. TXT ", where yyyy represents the year, XXXX represents the study area, and Zzzz represents the data content, such as 2019_ sccn_ 3-D_ velocity_ Models.txt represents this ASCII file to describe the three-dimensional velocity model of Changning area in Sichuan in 2019.
Data reading mode: all ASCII files in the data set can be opened directly with text programs (such as Notepad). It is recommended to view them in Linux system. The first line of the file is data content, and the main content is numerical value, such as lon for longitude, lat for latitude, DEP for depth, VP for P-wave velocity, vs for S-wave velocity. If you want to use the graphic to display, you can use GMT software to draw.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：地震重定位、速度模型以纯文本格式存储，文件的名称为“yyyy_xxxx_zzzz.txt”，其中yyyy代表年，xxxx代表研究区域，zzzz代表数据内容，比如2019_sccn_3-D_velocity_models.txt就代表这个ASCII文件描述2019年四川长宁地区三维速度模型。
数据读取方式：该数据集中的所有ASCII码文件可以直接用文本程序（如记事本）打开，建议在Linux系统下查看，文件第一行为数据内容，主体内容为数值如Lon表示经度、lat表示纬度、dep表示深度、Vp表示纵波速度、Vs表示横波速度。如果要用图示来显示的话，可用GMT软件进行绘图。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of seismic velocity models used in studying the crust and upper mantle structures in southern China?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于研究中国南方地壳和上地幔结构的地震速度模型的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high-resolution 3D imaging, double-difference tomography, P-wave and S-wave arrival times, variations in seismic velocities, high and low velocity zones
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高分辨率三维成像，双差层析成像，P波和S波到达时间，地震波速变化，高速和低速区。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many P wave arrival times were collected for studying the P wave upper mantle tomography in eastern China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在研究中国东部的P波上地幔层析成像时，收集了多少个P波到达时间？

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the observed low wave speed anomalies below fault zones inform our understanding of seismic activity in tectonically active regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 观察到的低波速异常在断层带下方如何帮助我们理解构造活跃区域的地震活动？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Low wave speed anomalies below fault zones often indicate the presence of fluids or partially molten materials, which can reduce the effective normal stress on fault planes. This condition could lead to the triggering of earthquakes as these fluids alter the mechanical properties of the crust and mantle, potentially providing critical insights into the mechanics of earthquake initiation and propagation in tectonically active regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 低波速异常出现在断层带下方，通常表明存在流体或部分熔融材料，这可能会降低断层面的有效法向应力。这种情况可能导致地震的触发，因为这些流体改变了地壳和地幔的机械性质，从而可能为了解构造活跃区域地震发生和传播的机制提供重要线索。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying causes that necessitate the use of high-resolution velocity models for understanding the mechanism of moderate-seismic events in southern China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 理解中国南方中等震级事件机制所需的高分辨率速度模型的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The necessity for high-resolution velocity models arises because these models help in better understanding the depth and characteristics of seismic events, such as the main shock and aftershocks occurring at depths of about 5-10 km. These insights reveal the presence of fluids that may lower the effective normal stress on fault planes, potentially linked to the deep subduction of the Indian plate and the resulting thermal and moist mantle upwelling.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 高分辨率速度模型的必要性在于，这些模型有助于更好地理解发生在约5-10公里深度的地震事件的深度和特征，例如主震和余震。这些见解揭示了可能存在的流体，这些流体可能降低了断层面的有效法向应力，这可能与印度板块的深部俯冲以及由此导致的热和潮湿的地幔上涌有关。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of using high-resolution velocity models to understand the mechanisms of moderate earthquakes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高分辨率速度模型来理解中等地震机制的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: High-resolution velocity models can reveal details such as the depth and structure of fault planes, the presence of fluids in the crust, and the role of fluids in reducing effective normal stress on fault planes. These insights can help in identifying the causes of earthquakes, such as fluid-induced stress changes and deep mantle processes, which are crucial for understanding earthquake mechanisms and improving prediction models.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 高分辨率速度模型可以揭示诸如断层面深度和结构、地壳中流体的存在以及流体在降低断层面有效法向应力中的作用等细节。这些见解有助于识别地震的成因，例如流体诱导的应力变化和深地幔过程，这对于理解地震机制和改进预测模型至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it significant to explore the relationship between mantle structure and earthquake occurrences through seismic tomography in regions like southern China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 通过地震层析成像探索地幔结构与地震发生之间的关系在南方中国等地区具有重要意义。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Exploring the relationship between mantle structure and earthquake occurrences through seismic tomography in regions like southern China is significant because it helps understand the mechanisms behind earthquakes, such as those induced by fluid presence that reduce effective normal stress on fault planes. This understanding can facilitate the identification of tectonic controls on earthquake generation and propagation, as seen in the Sichuan Basin and the Tanlu Fault Zone. Additionally, it sheds light on the impact of deep mantle dynamics, like subduction and upwelling processes, on seismic activity.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 通过在南方中国等地区进行地震层析成像，探索地幔结构与地震发生之间的关系具有重要意义，因为这有助于理解地震背后的机制，例如流体的存在会降低断层面上的有效正应力。这种理解可以促进识别地震发生和传播的构造控制，如四川盆地和滩泸断裂带。此外，它还揭示了深地幔动力学（如俯冲和上涌过程）对地震活动的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are used to collect and analyze seismic wave data for constructing a high-resolution velocity model of the crust and upper mantle in tectonically active regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于收集和分析地震波数据以构建构造活跃地区地壳和上地幔高分辨率速度模型的方法论有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field, methodologies such as double-difference tomography are utilized to relocate earthquakes and build three-dimensional high-resolution velocity models. Data is collected from multiple seismic stations, as exemplified by the recording of 8818 earthquake events using 39 stations, capturing P and S wave arrival times. The analysis involves studying velocity anomalies, such as low Vp, low Vs, and high Vp/Vs, which can reflect geological features like fluid presence or fault activities.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在该领域，采用双差成像法等方法来重新定位地震并构建三维高分辨率速度模型。数据来自多个地震台站，例如通过39个台站记录了8818个地震事件，捕捉到P波和S波的到达时间。分析涉及研究速度异常，如低Vp、低Vs和高Vp/Vs，这些异常可以反映地质特征，如流体存在或断层活动。
